abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Victoria and Albert Museum in London plans international touring exhibition of Victorian-era children's peep show books donated by collectors Jacqueline and Jonathan Gestetner; Les Enluminures gallery mounts exhibition The Idda Collection: Romanesque Biblical Manuscripts c. 1000 to 1240.
lead_paragraph: The three-dimensional toys show layers of scenes, pierced with viewing holes, representing parks, gardens, battlefields, theaters and engineering feats like canals, tunnels and bridges.

headline.main: Antiquarian Book Fair Offers Victorian Children’s Peep Shows
headline.print_headline: Children’s Peep Shows at Antiquarian Book Fair

snippet: The three-dimensional toys show layers of scenes, pierced with viewing holes, representing parks, gardens, battlefields, theaters and engineering feats like canals, tunnels and bridges.
